title: Solutions Engineer Toolkit
description: A dynamic document generator for pre-sales solutions engineers, built to integrate with Salesforce and generate real-time DOCX/PDF materials from customer profiles. Designed to accelerate enterprise SE workflows.
longDescription: Built to solve the tedious manual work of creating custom proposals and documentation for enterprise sales. Integrates directly with Salesforce to pull customer data and generates professional materials in seconds, not hours.
highlights: Real-time document generation (DOCX/PDF)
Dynamic in-document AI-powered suggestions and diff management
Human-in-the-loop editing pipeline
Accelerates SE workflows by 90%

title: AutoBrainlift
description: A productivity tool for AI-first developers using Cursor. AutoBrainlift automatically generates summaries of your Git commits, producing AI memory input and human-readable reflections to boost context retention and workflow clarity.
longDescription: Built to solve my own problem of losing context between development sessions. AutoBrainlift analyzes Git history and generates meaningful summaries that help maintain project context and accelerate AI-assisted development workflows.
highlights: Hooks into Git commit history
Generates dev-facing and reflection documents
Pluggable into any AI-first workflow using Cursor
Used daily for 6+ months

title: MAYAN EDMS: Research-Centric Modernization
description: An enterprise-grade modernization of the open-source MAYAN EDMS platform for university research workflows. Designed to support scientific hierarchy, role-based access control, AWS-native cloud infrastructure, and AI-augmented document intelligence.
longDescription: Designed for research teams needing reliable document management and workflow automation. Modernizes the MAYAN EDMS platform with cloud-native infrastructure, AI-powered document processing, and research-specific access controls.
highlights: Hierarchical research data model + access control
Modern AWS infrastructure setup with Docker Compose
OCR, AI tagging, and PDF enrichment pipeline
Scales to 100+ concurrent researchers

title: WordWise
description: An AI-powered grammar and writing assistant that provides intelligent, context-aware revisions and feedback for students and professionals. WordWise acts like a private writing tutor, helping users write smarter with real-time suggestions and explanations.
longDescription: Built for writers who want to improve their craft, not just correct their mistakes. WordWise provides contextual explanations and suggestions that help users understand grammar rules while they write, creating a learning experience that sticks.
highlights: GPT-4 integration for smart grammar rewriting
Explains grammar rules in real-time
Fine-tuned UX for clarity and minimalism
Helps users learn while they write
